channel.title: Spanning Tree Protocol Basics - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: RSTP is the most common spanning tree protocol. And Cisco devices default to using RSTP. MAC table instability The switches MAC address tables keep changing because frames with the same source MAC arrive on different ports. Broadcast storms forwarding of a frame repeatedly on the same links Multiple frame transmission side effect of looping frames Multiple copies are delivered to a host, confusing the host. What Spanning Tree Does blocking state
